title: SMS Backup
content: I have a google account, I have auto backup enabled on my pixel 4.  I'm concerned about my SMS messaging being backed up and then restored when doing a factory reset.  I'm using the stock google messages app.  When I look at Backup is shows app data was backed up 20 minutes ago, then futher down SMS Text messages indicates "Waiting to back up...  So, has my SMS data backedup or not?
